LanguageData.Anneli_NeoYokohama_HomelyShinobi.title: Homely Shinobi
LanguageData.Anneli_NeoYokohama_HomelyShinobi.baseDes: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as a homely shinobi. She used her talents to create a peaceful and nurturing environment at home.
LanguageData.Anneli_NeoYokohama_FearsomeShinobi.title: Fearsome Shinobi
Shinobi
LanguageData.Anneli_NeoYokohama_FearsomeShinobi.baseD: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as a a master of stealth and assassination.
LanguageData.Anneli_NeoYokohama_HaikuSamurai.title: Haiku Samurai
LanguageData.Anneli_NeoYokohama_HaikuSamurai.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as a samurai and a poet.
LanguageData.Anneli_NeoYokohama_VersatileSamurai.base: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as a samurai. She seamlessly blends traditional martial art skills with cutting-edge technology, like laser muskets.
LanguageData.Anneli_NeoYokohama_WinnerSalaryman.title: Winner Salaryman
Salaryman
LanguageData.Anneli_NeoYokohama_WinnerSalaryman.baseD: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as a consumable, but successful corporate manager.
LanguageData.Anneli_NeoYokohama_NormalSalaryman.title: Normal Salaryman
Salaryman
LanguageData.Anneli_NeoYokohama_NormalSalaryman.baseD: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as a consumable salaryman. Her passion for botany exceeds her interest in daily work.
LanguageData.Anneli_NeoYokohama_LoserSalaryman.title: Loser Salaryman
LanguageData.Anneli_NeoYokohama_LoserSalaryman.baseDe: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as an unemployed salaryman. She found solace in the companionship of her cat, the only one who truly loves her.
LanguageData.Anneli_NeoYokohama_ConstructionWorker.ba: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as an employee of a construction company. She managed to stealing and selling company assets.
LanguageData.Anneli_NeoYokohama_RevolutionaryWorker.b: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as a fervent revolutionary proletariat. Formerly a laborer in the mining industry, she has become an expert in crafting homemade bombs.
LanguageData.Anneli_NeoYokohama_Punk.title: Punk
LanguageData.Anneli_NeoYokohama_Punk.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as a local gangster, who has a knack for shooting and a swagger that says she's the next rap queen.
LanguageData.Anneli_NeoYokohama_UnlicensedDoctor.base: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as a doctor, with a 50% chance of saving lives or ending them.
LanguageData.Anneli_NeoYokohama_SewerDweller.title: Sewer Dweller
LanguageData.Anneli_NeoYokohama_SewerDweller.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as a homeless person in the depths of the city's underbelly, hunting bio-rats to sustain herself.
